00020 #include <QSharedPointer>
00021 
00022 Register::Register(QDomNode& registerNode): RegisterModel(registerNode),
00023 dim_(-1), addressOffset_(), alternateRegisters_(), registerDefinition_() {
00024 
00025         for (int i = 0; i < registerNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00026                 QDomNode tempNode = registerNode.childNodes().at(i);
00027 
00028                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:dim")) {
00029                         dim_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00030                 }
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressOffset")) {
00032                         addressOffset_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00033                         addressOffset_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(addressOffset_);
00034                 }
00035                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:alternateRegisters")) {
00036 
00037                         // parse each alternate register
00038                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00039                                 QDomNode alternateRegNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00040 
00041                                 alternateRegisters_.append(QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister>(
00042                                                 new AlternateRegister(alternateRegNode)));
00043                         }
00044                 }
00045 
00046         }
00047 
00048         registerDefinition_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00049                         new RegisterDefinition(registerNode));
00050 
00051         // if mandatory addressOffset is missing
00052         if (addressOffset_.isNull()) {
00053                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory addressOffset missing in"
00054                                 " spirit:register"));
00055         }
00056         return;
00057 }
00058 
00059 Register::Register( const Register& other ):
00060 RegisterModel(other),
00061 dim_(other.dim_),
00062 addressOffset_(other.addressOffset_),
00063 alternateRegisters_(),
00064 registerDefinition_() {
00065 
00066         foreach (QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister> altReg, other.alternateRegisters_) {
00067                 if (altReg) {
00068                         QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister> copy = QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister>(
00069                                 new AlternateRegister(*altReg.data()));
00070                         alternateRegisters_.append(copy);
00071                 }
00072         }
00073 
00074         if (other.registerDefinition_) {
00075                 registerDefinition_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00076                         new RegisterDefinition(*other.registerDefinition_));
00077         }
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 Register& Register::operator=( const Register& other ) {
00082         if (this != &other) {
00083                 RegisterModel::operator=(other);
00084 
00085                 dim_ = other.dim_;
00086                 addressOffset_ = other.addressOffset_;
00087 
00088                 alternateRegisters_.clear();
00089                 foreach (QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister> altReg, other.alternateRegisters_) {
00090                         if (altReg) {
00091                                 QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister> copy = QSharedPointer<AlternateRegister>(
00092                                         new AlternateRegister(*altReg.data()));
00093                                 alternateRegisters_.append(copy);
00094                         }
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 if (other.registerDefinition_) {
00098                         registerDefinition_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>(
00099                                 new RegisterDefinition(*other.registerDefinition_));
00100                 }
00101                 else
00102                         registerDefinition_ = QSharedPointer<RegisterDefinition>();
00103         }
00104         return *this;
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 Register::~Register() {
00109         alternateRegisters_.clear();
00110         registerDefinition_.clear();
00111 }
00112 
00113 void Register::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00114         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:register");
00115 
00116         // call base class to write base class info
00117         RegisterModel::write(writer);
00118 
00119         // if optional spirit:dim is defined
00120         if (dim_ >= 0) {
00121                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:dim", QString::number(dim_));
00122         }
00123 
00124         // if mandatory addressOffset is not defined
00125         if (addressOffset_.isEmpty()) {
00126                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory addressOffset missing in "
00127                                 "spirit:register"));
00128         }
00129         else {
00130                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:addressOffset", addressOffset_);
00131         }
00132 
00133         // call registerDefinition to write itself
00134         if (registerDefinition_) {
00135                 registerDefinition_->write(writer);
00136         }
00137 
00138         // if any alternate registers exist
00139         if (alternateRegisters_.size() != 0) {
00140                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:alternateRegisters");
00141 
00142                 // write each alternate register
00143                 for (int i = 0; i < alternateRegisters_.size(); ++i) {
00144                         alternateRegisters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:alternateRegisters
00148         }
00149         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:register
00150 }
